name: Lunar Encore
description:
(The following download is a work in progress that is subject to change.)

After Laila mysteriously gains the powers of her ancestor, she and her cat Rover are greeted to their town being overran by toys and lost souls.  They decide they must free the lost souls during the daytime while fighting toys during the night time, while finding the cause of this new phenomenon.  

Lunar Encore is an action adventure game in which players will explore a dungeon packed with combat challenges and puzzles. Every twenty to forty seconds, the time of day changes. During the daytime, gain health from the souls who are lost, during the nighttime, those very souls turn into monsters.

Controls:

Move: WASD/Arrow Keys/Left Control Stick

Melee Attack: Left Mouse Click/A Button (Xbox)/X Button (PlayStation)

Projectile Attack: Right Mouse Click/Left Bumper (Xbox/PlayStation)

Dash: Space Bar/B Button (Xbox)/Circle Button (PlayStation)

Wand of Nights: E Key/X Button (Xbox)/Square Button (PlayStation)

Change Mode for Wand of Nights: Q Key/Y Button (Xbox)/Triangle Button (PlayStation)

The Team:

Game Design/Programmer: Joshlynn

Character Design/Character Sprites: PixiTales

Sound Effects/Tileset Artist: Lyte

Story: Dosei

Music: HendersonRoad 

Voices: GliseningMoon7
